只: (し) - Apenas, ordinário, comum, usual; de graça; inalterado, como está, seguro; somente, meramente, simplesmente
只ならぬ: (ただならぬ) - unusual; uncommon; extraordinary; out of the ordinary; incomparable; serious; alarming
只の人: (ただのひと) - man in the street; common (ordinary) person
只人: (ただひと) - ordinary person; untitled individual
只今帰りました: (ただいまかえりました) - Here I am; I'm home!
只働き: (ただばたらき) - working for free
只取: (ただどり) - getting something for nothing
只取り: (ただどり) - getting something for nothing
只管: (ひたすら) - nothing but; earnest; intent; determined; set on (something)
只管打坐: (しかんたざ) - shikantaza (zazen meditation in which one focuses on sitting without actively seeking enlightenment)
只者: (ただもの) - ordinary person (usu. in neg. sentences)
只言: (ただこと) - plain speech; direct speech
只酒: (タダザケ) - free alcohol; free liquor; free drinks
只飯: (タダメシ) - free food; free meal
叫く: (わめく) - to shout; to cry; to scream; to clamour
叫び出す: (さけびだす) - to let out a cry; to break forth
叫ぶ: (sakebu) - to shout, to cry, to scream, to shriek, to yell, to exclaim; to clamor (a favor ou contra), to clamour (for or against)
召される: (めされる) - to do; to eat/to drink; to put on/to wear; to buy; to ride; to catch (a cold)/to take (a bath)/to tickle (one's fancy)/to put on (years)/to commit (seppuku); honorific suffix used after the -masu stem of a verb
召し上げる: (めしあげる) - to forfeit/to confiscate; to call out/to summon
召し使う: (めしつかう) - to employ; to hire (a servant)
召し出す: (めしだす) - to call out; to summon
召し取る: (めしとる) - to arrest/to apprehend; (召し取る, 召取る only)  to call/to summon
召し寄せる: (めしよせる) - to call (someone) to you; to call together; to call to come
召し抱える: (めしかかえる) - to employ; to engage
召し捕る: (めしとる) - to arrest/to apprehend; (召し取る, 召取る only)  to call/to summon
召し連れる: (めしつれる) - to bring along; to accompany
召し集める: (めしあつめる) - to call together
召す: (めす) - to call/to invite/to send for/to summon; to eat/to drink; to put on/to wear; to ride; to catch (a cold)/to take (a bath)/to tickle (one's fancy)/to put on (years)/to commit (seppuku); to do; honorific suffix used after the -masu stem of a verb
召ずる: (しょうずる) - to summon; to invite; to call; to have as one's guest
召上げる: (めしあげる) - to forfeit/to confiscate; to call out/to summon
召使う: (めしつかう) - to employ; to hire (a servant)
召取る: (めしとる) - to arrest/to apprehend; (召し取る, 召取る only)  to call/to summon
召喚: (shoukan) - intimação, intimações, citação, intimação judicial, acusando, convocando, chamando
召喚令状: (しょうかんれいじょう) - summons for directions (legal UK)
召喚状: (しょうかんじょう) - call; summons; subpoena
召捕る: (めしとる) - to arrest/to apprehend; (召し取る, 召取る only)  to call/to summon
召状: (しょうじょう) - letter of invitation
召還: (しょうかん) - recall (esp. of an envoy or an ambassador); calling someone back; summons (home)
召集: (shoushuu) - convening, calling together (por exemplo, parlamento), call-up (for military service)
召集令: (しょうしゅうれい) - mustering-out order; callup
召集令状: (しょうしゅうれいじょう) - draft papers; callup notice
可い: (べい) - word used at sentence-end (like a particle) to indicate speculation, volition or invitation; should/must
可からず: (べからず) - must not; should not; do not
可き: (べき) - (suf. to verbs) should/must/that one ought to/to be done; (passive ending) -able; probably/likely
可くして: (べくして) - as it is bound to (happen)/following the natural course; though possible as it may be
可とする: (かとする) - to approve (of); to be in favor of; to be in favour of
可の評点: (かのひょうてん) - grade C; Passable
可もなく不可もなし: (かもなくふかもなし) - neither good nor bad
可付番集合: (かふばんしゅうごう) - denumerable set; countable set
可住地: (かじゅうち) - habitable area; inhabitable land
可処分所得: (かしょぶんしょとく) - disposable income; disposable personal income; DPI
可動堰: (かどうぜき) - canal gates; river gates
可動役物: (かどうやくもの) - moving gadget on a pachinko machine designed to add excitement to play
可及的: (かきゅうてき) - as ... as possible
可及的速やかに: (かきゅうてきすみやかに) - as soon as possible; ASAP
可否: (かひ) - propriety/right and wrong/advisability/possibility; pro and con/ayes and noes
可否を採る: (かひをとる) - to take the ayes and noes
